description_zh: 使对象环绕一个位置沿椭圆轨迹运动。
description_en: Make an object move along an ellipse around a position.

conditions.description_zh: 测试行为是否已经启用。
conditions.description_en: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.description_en: Set the speed the object orbits at.

actions.description_zh: 设置环绕的中心点，沿其周围进行环绕运动。
actions.description_en: Target a position in the layout to orbit around.

actions.description_zh: 根据旋转角度，设置当前轨道的位置。
actions.description_en: Set the current orbit position by its angle.

actions.description_zh: 设置椭圆轨道的旋转偏移角度，对于圆形轨道，则影响初始的角度。
actions.description_en: Set offset of ellipse angle from axis.
Set the primary and secondary orbit radii.

actions.description_zh: 对象的角度是否跟随轨道的角度而旋转。
将轨道固定到指定对象，与对象的位置同步运行，沿其周围进行环绕运动。
actions.description_en: Set an object as the target location to orbit around.

actions.description_zh: 解除对象的固定，不再跟随对象的位置运动。
设置轨道旋转的速率变化。
actions.description_en: Set the rate the object's orbital rotation changes.
Set whether this behavior is enabled.

actions.description_zh: 重置总旋转角度和总绝对旋转角度的计数，全部归零。
actions.description_en: Return the total rotation and total absolute rotation counters to 0

expressions.description_zh: 沿轨道环绕的速度，以每秒度数为单位。
expressions.description_en: The orbit speed in degrees per second.

expressions.description_zh: 轨道加速度，以度数/秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The orbit acceleration in degrees per second per second.

expressions.description_zh: 在主轴轨道上每秒的运动距离，单位是像素每秒。
expressions.description_en: The length of the primary radius, in pixels.

expressions.description_zh: 次级半径的长度，以像素为单位。
expressions.description_en: The length of the secondary radius, in pixels.
The ellipse offset angle, in degrees.
The current orbit rotation, in degrees.
The current distance to the target position.

expressions.description_zh: 当前未被约束的总旋转角度，该值会随着 CCW 旋转而降低。
expressions.description_en: The total unclamped rotation so far, in degrees. Value decreases with CCW rotation.

expressions.description_zh: 当前未被约束的总旋转角度。
expressions.description_en: The total unclamped rotation so far, in degrees.

properties.description_zh: 环绕的速度。正数为顺时针方向运动，负数则为逆时针运动。
properties.description_en: The rotation speed, in degrees per second. Positive is clockwise and negative is anticlockwise.

properties.description_zh: 每秒提升旋转的加速度，负值则减慢。
properties.description_en: Rotation acceleration in degrees per second per second (negative slows down).

properties.description_zh: 圆心点与轨道的距离。对于圆形轨道，主半径为圆形的半径。对于椭圆轨道，则为偏移角度的轨道半径。
properties.description_en: The radius of the orbit along its primary axis.

properties.description_zh: 圆心点与轨道的垂直距离。对于圆形轨道，请确保与主半径是相同值。对于椭圆轨道，则为垂直于偏移角度的半径。
properties.description_en: The radius of the orbit along its secondary axis (for a circle use the same as the primary axis).

properties.description_zh: 主轴的旋转角度。对于圆形轨道，则改变初始角度。
properties.description_en: Rotation of the primary axis in degrees.

properties.description_zh: 对象的角度是否跟随轨道的角度而旋转。
properties.description_en: Whether the instance should also rotate, so that it faces the direction of travel.

properties.description_zh: 进入场景时，是否默认启用该行为。
properties.description_en: Whether the behavior is initially enabled or disabled.

properties.description_zh: 在编辑器中进行实时预览。
properties.description_en: Tick to run a live preview in the editor.
